article_title: Congress Is Getting A Special Exemption From ObamaCare--And No, It's Not Legal

article_metadata.description: If Prof. Bagley can substantiate his claim that "the ACA singles out [Congress] as a special case" where the rules limiting SHOP Exchanges to small businesses do not apply, he should do so. If not, what does that tell us?
article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon

og.description: If Prof. Bagley can substantiate his claim that "the ACA singles out [Congress] as a special case" where the rules limiting SHOP Exchanges to small businesses do not apply, he should do so. If not, what does that tell us?
